infeasible_scenarios.reasoning: Delta compression is a performance optimization pattern that would require measuring actual bandwidth reduction and real-time message throughput. In the eval sandbox without a running PubNub instance, it is impossible to verify that delta messages are smaller or that full-state fallback works correctly under load.

The skill includes iOS (Swift) and Android (Kotlin) SDK initialization patterns, but the eval sandbox only has a Node.js/JavaScript runtime. Compiling and validating Swift or Kotlin code is not feasible without Xcode or Android SDK toolchains.

The game replay feature (replayGame function) requires Message Persistence enabled and actual historical messages stored in PubNub channels. Without API keys and pre-populated channel history, the replay functionality cannot be meaningfully tested in a file-based eval.
